blocks.name: leaddsuble
blocks.content: Addition and subtraction on one side of "less than or equal to". (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: 2leaddle2
blocks.content: If two real numbers are less than a third real number, the sum of the real numbers is less than twice the third real number. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 21-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2leaddle2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))
} = {
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))
  sylc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(nat2, cmul, c2)), w3a(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c2), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cr)), wa(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c2), cle, co(nat2, cmul, c2))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), w3a(wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c2), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cr)))
  3jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c2), cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cr))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr))
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c2), cr))
  anidms(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c2), cr))
  readdcl(c2, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cr))
  jca(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c2), cle, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))
  sylc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, co(c2, caddc, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr))), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr))))
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  id(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr)))
  jca(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  id(wcel(c2, cr))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)))
  lt2add(c0, c1, c2, c2)
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c2)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c2), cle, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c2), cle, co(nat2, cmul, c2)))
  eqbrtrrd(co(c2, caddc, c2), cle, co(nat2, cmul, c2), co(nat2, cmul, c2), wcel(c2, cr))
  2timesd(c2, wcel(c2, cr))
  recn(c2)
  leidd(co(nat2, cmul, c2), wcel(c2, cr))
  mpan(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, c2), cr), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  remulcl(nat2, c2)
  ltletr(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c2), co(nat2, cmul, c2))
}

blocks.name: ltnltne
blocks.content: Variant of trichotomy law for 'less than'. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jun-2018.)

blocks.name: p1lep2
blocks.content: A real number increasd by 1 is less than or equal to the number increased by 2. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: ltsubsubaddltsub
blocks.content: If the result of subtracting two numbers is greater than a number, the result of adding one of these subtracted numbers to the number is less than the result of subtracting the other subtracted number only. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Jun-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltsubsubaddltsub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, cmin, c3))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wbr(c0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, cmin, c3)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), clt, co(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3), caddc, c2)))
  ltadd1d(c0, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3), cr))
  resubcld(co(c1, cmin, c2), c3, w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))
  3adant3(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cr))
  resubcl(c1, c2)
  simp3(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))
  breq2d(co(c0, caddc, c2), clt, co(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3), caddc, c2), co(c1, cmin, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wceq(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3), caddc, c2), co(c1, cmin, c3)))
  syl3an(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wceq(co(co(co(c1, cmin, c2), cmin, c3), caddc, c2), co(c1, cmin, c3)), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  recn(c1)
  recn(c2)
  recn(c3)
  nnpcan(c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: zm1nn
blocks.content: An integer minus 1 is positive under certain circumstances. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Jun-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm zm1nn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)))
} = {
  com12(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn))
  3impib(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1)), wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)))
  com23(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn))
  ex(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)))
  syld(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1), cr))
  0red(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))))
  simpl(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))), wcel(co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1), cr), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cr))
  adantl(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cr))
  peano2rem(co(c1, cmin, c0))
  lelttr(nat0, c2, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1))
  adantl(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)))
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmin, nat1)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  posdifd(nat1, co(c1, cmin, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, c0), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  resubcl(c1, c0)
  sylbird(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(nat1, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1))
  ltaddsubd(nat1, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cr))
  nn0re(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cr))
  imp(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wi(wcel(c1, cz), wi(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  elnn0z(c0)
  impancom(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wi(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cle, co(nat1, caddc, c0)))
  leadd2d(nat0, c0, nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c0, cr))
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  expd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cle, co(nat1, caddc, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn))
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cle, co(nat1, caddc, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cle, co(nat1, caddc, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, c0), clt, c1)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1)), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cr), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cr))
  readdcli(nat1, nat0)
  1re()
  0re()
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, c0), cr))
  readdcld(nat1, c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  1red(wcel(c0, cz))
  zre(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cr))
  lelttr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), co(nat1, caddc, c0), c1)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cn), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c1, cmin, nat1), cz))
  peano2zm(c1)
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wi(wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1))))
  biimpd(wcel(c1, cz), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, nat0), clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, nat1)))
  ltaddsub2d(nat1, nat0, c1, wcel(c1, cz))
  1red(wcel(c1, cz))
  0red(wcel(c1, cz))
  zre(c1)
  elnnz(co(c1, cmin, nat1))
}
